record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that we now proceed to a period of morning business, that Senator Lugar be recognized to speak for up to one-half hour, and that following his speech, I be recognized.

record.chair: Is there objection to the majority leader's previous request?
Is there objection to the majority leader's pending request?
Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I further ask unanimous consent that if and when we get on the PEPFAR legislation, the distinguished Senator from Indiana be recognized for an opening statement on the bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The Senator from Indiana is recognized.
